title: SnapScrew
author: SnapScrew
content: I want to exchange USD cash to bitcoins in Istanbul with no KYC, offline.We can talk details in DM and meet on public place to make a deal.It's great if we can connect with you and sometimes make deals later.

comments.author: SnapScrew
comments.body: Quote from: varanvaran on July 18, 2023, 11:13:53 PMHow much will it costThe cost is 3%We will use coinbase rate https://www.coinbase.com/converter/btc/usd plus 3% to BTC amount.For example, now rate is 0.334089879866 for $10000, thus you will transfer me (0.334089879866 * 1.03) = 0.34411257626198 BTC for $10000 (i will up a $300).We can exchange a small amounts for first time, a hundreds dollars.
